verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the earth <S%H776><s%> was without <S%H8414><s%> form, <S%H8414><s%> and void; <S%H922><s%> and darkness <S%H2822><s%> was on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep. <S%H8415><s%> And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> moved <S%H7363><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let there be light: <S%H216><s%> and there was light. <S%H216><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the light, <S%H216><s%> that it was good: <S%H2896><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> divided <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> Day, <S%H3117><s%> and the darkness <S%H2822><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> Night. <S%H3915><s%> And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the first <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let there be a firmament <S%H7549><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and let it divide <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the waters. <S%H4325><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the firmament, <S%H7549><s%> and divided <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were under <S%H8478><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were above <S%H5921><s%> the firmament: <S%H7549><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> Heaven. <S%H8064><s%> And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the second <S%H8145><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> be gathered <S%H6960><s%> together to one <S%H259><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and let the dry <S%H3004><s%> land appear: <S%H7200><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land Earth; <S%H776><s%> and the gathering <S%H4723><s%> together of the waters <S%H4325><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> he Seas: <S%H3220><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring <S%H1876><s%> forth <S%H1876><s%> grass, <S%H1877><s%> the herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> is in itself, on the earth: <S%H776><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And the earth <S%H776><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> grass, <S%H1877><s%> and herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H6213><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> was in itself, after his kind: <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let there be lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to divide <S%H914><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> from the night; <S%H3915><s%> and let them be for signs, <S%H226><s%> and for seasons, <S%H4150><s%> and for days, <S%H3117><s%> and years: <S%H8141><s%>
And let them be for lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H216><s%> on the earth: <S%H776><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights; <S%H3974><s%> the greater <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> and the lesser <S%H6996><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the night: <S%H3915><s%> he made the stars <S%H3556><s%> also.
And God <S%H430><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> them in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H216><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%>

And to rule <S%H4910><s%> over the day <S%H3117><s%> and over the night, <S%H3915><s%> and to divide <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness: <S%H2822><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> bring <S%H8317><s%> forth <S%H8317><s%> abundantly <S%H8317><s%> the moving <S%H8318><s%> creature <S%H8318><s%> that has life, <S%H2416><s%> and fowl <S%H5775><s%> that may fly <S%H5774><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> firmament <S%H7549><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> whales, <S%H8577><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moves, <S%H7430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> brought <S%H8317><s%> forth <S%H8317><s%> abundantly, <S%H8317><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> winged <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> after his kind: <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and let fowl <S%H5775><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> cattle, <S%H929><s%> and creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing, and beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after his kind: <S%H4327><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> thing that creeps <S%H7431><s%> on the earth <S%H127><s%> after his kind: <S%H4327><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good. <S%H2896><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let us make <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in our image, <S%H6754><s%> after our likeness: <S%H1823><s%> and let them have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and over the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and over the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and over all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and over every <S%H3605><s%> creeping <S%H7431><s%> thing that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

So God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in his own image, <S%H6754><s%> in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> he him; male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> he them.

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and replenish <S%H4390><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and subdue <S%H3533><s%> it: and have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and over the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and over every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing that moves <S%H7430><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> bearing <S%H2232><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the face <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> in the which <S%H834><s%> is the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed; <S%H2233><s%> to you it shall be for meat. <S%H402><s%>

And to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and to every <S%H3605><s%> thing that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> there is life, <S%H2416><s%> I have given every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> for meat: <S%H402><s%> and it was so. <S%H3651><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> thing that he had made, <S%H6213><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was very <S%H3966><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%> And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
